the-emperor.name: The Emperor
the-emperor.desc: Go for it with persistence and discipline.

the-hierophant.name: The Hierophant
the-hierophant.desc: Find a mentor and listen attentively.

the-chariot.name: The Chariot
the-chariot.desc: The war is over, and you are the winner!

strength.name: Strength
strength.desc: Tame your instincts and use them.

justice.name: Justice
justice.desc: Get what you deserve: reward or retribution?

the-hanged-man.name: The Hanged Man
the-hanged-man.desc: Look at the situation from a different angle.

death.name: Death
death.desc: Let go of what no longer serves you.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.desc: Be patient: your wishes are about to come true.

the-tower.name: The Tower
the-tower.desc: Whatever happens, happens for the best.

the-moon.name: The Moon
the-moon.desc: Try to find the truth among illusions.

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.desc: Say Yes to change - it will bring you happiness.

the-world.name: The World
the-world.desc: And they lived happily ever after!
